q: Students have ___ goals when planning their future.
The doctor requested that his patient ___ his upcoming appointment.
Identification is ___ to prove who you are.
She ___ to be the daughter of an old friend.
Mary ___ to become an astronaut when she grows up.
The pianist was a(n) ___ talent that had performed around the world.
The student ___ to accomplish his goal of achieving a high mark in his classes.
I (began) my speech with a humorous story.
Do not let the amount of work you need to get for school (frighten) you.
Always make sure to (keep up) your grades in school.
As students, we (aim) to achieve our scholarly goals.
The book I needed from the library was not (accessible), because someone else had taken it out.
